ResearchProjectDef.label: Starting Point
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the engineering bench required to build most of the equipment and ammo used in the German Armory Mod. Unlocks the Feldspaten and the Säbel. The Feldspaten gives a slight boost to mining and digging. Unlocks the M1915 and M24 Stielhandgranates. They are hand grenades. Unlocks the Gewehr 98, an early German bolt-action rifle. Further research will unlock modifications which makes it deadlier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flamethrowers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks flamethrowers. Clear out bunkers or infestations with it. Unlocks the Eintossflammenwerfer 46 and the WEX flamethrower.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Field Artillery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks field artillery. Unlocks the 7.7 cm Feldkanone 96 neuer Art as well as it's shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pistols
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks early German pistols, the Volkspistole as well as the P08 Pistole Parabellum.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bolt Action Rifles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks bolt-action rifles used by the German Military. Unlocks the Karabiner 98 Kurtz and the Volkssturmgewehr VG.1 bolt-action rifles. Further research will unlock modifications to the rifles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bolt Action Rifle Attachments and Modifications
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks attachments and modifications for the Gewehr 98 and the Kar 98k. Unlocks the bayonet, and sniper modifications for those rifles. The Kar98K also has the Schiessbecher attachment; a grenade launcher

ResearchProjectDef.label: Assault Rifles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks semi-auto and full-auto rifles. Unlocks the Gewehr 43, the Mauser Selbstlader M1916, the STG 44, the FG 42, and the Volkssturmgewehr MP 507.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Light Machine Gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the MG 15, MG 34, and the MG 42. Also unlocks MG emplacements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sub Machine Gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks Sub Machine Guns. Unlocks the MP 18, MP 35, MP 40, and the MP 3008.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pistol II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks more advanced pistols. Unlocks the Mauser C96, Walther P38, Walther PPK, as well as the Artillerie mod of the Luger P08.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anti-Air Emplacements
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks Anti-Air Emplacements. Though there's nothing to shoot from the skies, the barrels depress enough to lay down suppresive fire on ground units.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anti-Tank Emplacement
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the PaK 36 and it's ammo types. It's decent calibre gives it a more powerful punch against armored targets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Infantry Support Guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks Infantry Support Guns. Unlocks the 7.5 cm leichtes Infanteriegeschütz 18 (leIG 18) as well as it's ammo types.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Anti-Tank Emplacement
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the PaK 40 and it's ammo types. It's large caliber gives it no resistance againt it's target. Armor or flesh.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rocket Anti-Tank
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the Panzerfaust 60. It's warhead makes it a viable choice against armored targets. It can also be used on fleshier foes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Artillery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the heaviest field artillery available. Unlocks the 10.5 cm leichte Feldhaubitze 16 and it's ammo types. It allows you to rain heavy hell on the enemy from afar.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Further Rifle Attachments and Modifications
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks attachments and modifications for the Gewehr 43, and the STG 44. Unlocks the bayonet, and sniper modifications for those rifles. Also unlocks the bPatronen variant of the Kar 98K.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rocket Artillery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the Nebelwerfer 41, a rocket artillery emplacement.
